column4: Maco, Xlq<<<I was reading on SkullBox.net that Hackers Use Telnet to hack into peoples computers
Well is anyone familiar with Chinanet and what they do and why they are always roaming in my computer as unknown?
Are you asking why you are getting hits on your firewall from addresses in China?
Its just normal botnet stuff, as long as you're on Linux you should be fine.  That traffic shouldn't be causing any issues with your normal connection.
